mapper.insert: insert into exercise (no, exname, exmu, expart, excnt, extime, id, exst, exed, exset, content) values(exercise_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{type}, #{part}, #{cnt}, #{time}, #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{start}, #{end}, #{set}, #{content})
mapper.select: select no, exmu, exname as title, id as userid, color, TO_CHAR(exst, 'YYYY-MM-DD') exst, TO_CHAR(exed, 'YYYY-MM-DD') exed from exercise where id=#{id}
select no as id, exname, exmu, expart, excmplt, excnt, extime, id as userid, exset, content, TO_CHAR(exst, 'YYYY-MM-DD') exst, TO_CHAR(exed, 'YYYY-MM-DD') exed from exercise where no=#{no}
mapper.update: update exercise set exname=#{title}, exmu=#{type}, expart=#{part}, excnt=#{cnt}, extime=#{time}, id=#{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, exst=#{start}, exed=#{end}, exset=#{set}, content=#{content} where no=#{no}
update exercise set excmplt='y', color='#ccff00' where no=#{no}
mapper.select: select * from EXERCISELIST where exno=#{exno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and id=#{id}
mapper.update: update exercise set color='#ff3333' where exed < to_char(sysdate+(9/24)-(1/24),'YYYY-MM-DD') and color is null
